review:
We had a wonderful experience with Dr Pushpak. He is a thorough professional and deals with patients with utmost care
We had consulted him on multiple occasions and are very Happy with the consultations. He takes time and provides the right diagnosis. Would highly recommend Dr Pushpak for any ortho related issues

Dr pushpak helped my mother to get a pain free knee . She has been suffering with right knee pain since 6 years . She is afraid of surgery so has been neglecting . Dr has suggested and explained about pain management ( cooled RF ) for the knee . She is comfortable and walking after the procedure .

I would strongly recommend Dr.Pushpak Reddy Chada . He was very gentle while examining . I was diagnosed with ACL tear with Meniscus tear .He explained about the procedure and post operative protocol very clearly.After the procedure pain was taken care very well by the team . Thank you so much doc

Dr Pushpak is very friendly, takes time to understand our problems and concerns. He also takes time to ensure we understand the diagnosis. He was very patient and explained the issues in the way we can understand. Can surely tell you are in safe hands as he doesn't recommend anything unnecessaryMultiple members from our family visited him based on our experience and all of them were very happy

I had an exceptional experience with Dr. Pushpak Reddy Chada. He is a highly professional and knowledgeable healthcare provider who genuinely cares for his patients. Dr. Chada listened attentively to my concerns and explained the diagnosis and treatment options in detail. I highly recommend him to anyone seeking quality healthcare services.

I am grateful for the excellent care provided by Dr. Pushpak Reddy for my distal phalange fracture. His detailed explanation of the treatment process, along with his attentive and comforting approach during the surgery and post-surgery dressings, made the entire experience seamless. A highly professional and amiable medical practitioner, I would recommend Dr. Reddy to anyone in need of reliable and compassionate medical treatment.

*** ****** *** **** ****** * **** ****** he  is very patient listens to the concerns and relate the issue in a very scientific manner and evaluate all possible things and come to the diagnosis, evaluated my pain and has done a proper follow up know I am totally relived , I personally recommend him to everyone.
